item.description:
I wanted to have this get together to meet as a group and try to brainstorm how to make this group bigger and better than ever! I think the group is a great idea and a good concept, but it has not been as successful as I'd hoped. I am open to all suggestions and ideas that people want to bring forward and will try to implement all that the group feels would benefit us as a whole.

I thought we could meet at the food court, then as a group decide where we want to go to lunch from there. There are several great restaurants in the mall that we could go to and brainstorm while we get some good eats!

I look forward to seeing all of you then!

***Update*** I screwed up and have a class on Feb 2nd, so I am changing the date to Feb 9th, same time, same place. I am sooooo sorry everyone!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be there early in front of the Ben & Jerry's in the food court on the 3rd floor. I have long red hair, I am 5'2", I wear glasses with dark rims and I am plus sized.
item.why: I want your opinions on how to make this meetup more successful and more enjoyable to all members!
item.name: Help please! RI Theater Group planning discussion and lunch
